mapper.select: SELECT c.customerId, c.customerName, c.customerUserId, ( SELECT u.realname FROM USER u WHERE u.uid = c.customerUserId ) AS customerUserName, c.customerCreateId, c.customerSourse, ( SELECT d.dictItemName FROM dict d WHERE dictType = '002' AND d.dictItemCode = c.customerSourse ) AS customerSourseDict, c.customerIndustry, ( SELECT d.dictItemName FROM dict d WHERE dictType = '001' AND d.dictItemCode = c.customerIndustry ) AS customerIndustryDict, c.customerPhone, c.customerAddress, c.customerDate FROM customer c
